Great Predator.name: Great Predator
Great Predator.examples: Dire Wolf, Velociraptor, Sabertooth Tiger, etc.

cL4kH57pf2nGIxaK.name: Beastform Transformation
cL4kH57pf2nGIxaK.description:
Pick a Tier 1 Beastform option and become a larger, more powerful version of that creature. While you’re in this form, you retain all traits and features from the original form and gain the following bonuses:

  • A +6 bonus to the damage rolls
  • A +1 bonus to the trait used by this form
  • A +2 bonus to evasion

RbZKFWATkfLZm67j.name: Beastform Transformation
RbZKFWATkfLZm67j.description: To transform into this creature, mark an additional Stress. Choose any two Beastform options from Tiers 1–2. Choose a total of four advantages and two features from those options.

vhwbPQ2YT64qD1t1.name: Beastform Transformation
vhwbPQ2YT64qD1t1.description:
Pick a Tier 1 or Tier 2 Beastform option and become a larger, more powerful version of that creature. While you’re in this form, you retain all traits and features from the original form and gain the the following bonuses:

  • A +9 bonus to damage rolls
  • A +2 bonus to the trait used by this form
  • A +3 bonus to Evasion
  • Your damage die increases by one size (d6 becomes d8, d8 becomes d10 etc.)

HutJQ9HGtr1Eoibp.name: Beastform Transformation
HutJQ9HGtr1Eoibp.description: To transform into this creature, mark 2 additional Stress. Choose any three Beastform options from Tiers 1–3. Choose a total of five advantages and three features from those options.

Agile.name: Agile
Agile.description: Your movement is silent, and you can spend a Hope to move up to Far range without rolling.

4yQ56hSL5LBkzrV6.name: Spend Hope
4yQ56hSL5LBkzrV6.description: Spend a Hope to move up to Far range without rolling.

Aquatic.name: Aquatic
Aquatic.description: You can breathe and move naturally underwater.

Armored Shell.name: Armored Shell
Armored Shell.description: Your hardened exterior gives you resistance to physical damage. Additionally, mark an Armor Slot to retract into your shell. While in your shell, physical damage is reduced by a number equal to your Armor Score (after applying resistance), but you can’t perform other actions without leaving this form.

15XSCpCAZ2JLspmN.name: Retract
15XSCpCAZ2JLspmN.description: Mark an Armor Slot to retract into your shell. While in your shell, physical damage is reduced by a number equal to your Armor Score (after applying resistance), but you can’t perform other actions without leaving this form.

XFmEC0kDQJNrGbtr.name: Armored Shell
XFmEC0kDQJNrGbtr.description: Your hardened exterior gives you resistance to physical damage.

OY3lEB3vuDKNLzxv.name: Retracted
OY3lEB3vuDKNLzxv.description: While in your shell, physical damage is reduced by a number equal to your Armor Score (after applying resistance), but you can’t perform other actions without leaving this form.

Bird's-Eye View.name: Bird's-Eye View
Bird's-Eye View.description: You can fly at will. Once per rest while you are airborne, you can ask the GM a question about the scene below you without needing to roll. The first time a character makes a roll to act on this information, they gain advantage on the roll.

JRCE5826Yhh09aaI.name: Ask Question
JRCE5826Yhh09aaI.description: Once per rest while you are airborne, you can ask the GM a question about the scene below you without needing to roll. The first time a character makes a roll to act on this information, they gain advantage on the roll.

Cannonball.name: Cannonball
Cannonball.description: Mark a Stress to allow an ally to throw or launch you at an adversary. To do so, the ally makes an attack roll using Agility or Strength (their choice) against a target within Close range. On a success, the adversary takes d12+2 physical damage using the thrower’s Proficiency. You can spend a Hope to target an additional adversary within Very Close range of the first. The second target takes half the damage dealt to the first target.

5Vxm8LyBHE1GYbsv.name: Cannonball
5Vxm8LyBHE1GYbsv.description: Mark a Stress to allow an ally to throw or launch you at an adversary. To do so, the ally makes an attack roll using Agility or Strength (their choice) against a target within Close range. On a success, the adversary takes d12+2 physical damage using the thrower’s Proficiency.

QCQzArBrajYi2D2I.name: Spend Hope
QCQzArBrajYi2D2I.description: You can spend a Hope to target an additional adversary within Very Close range of the first. The second target takes half the damage dealt to the first target.

Carrier.name: Carrier
Carrier.description: You can carry up to two willing allies with you when you move.

Companion.name: Companion
Companion.description: When you Help an Ally, you can roll a d8 as your advantage die.

Deadly Raptor.name: Deadly Raptor
Deadly Raptor.description: You can fly at will and move up to Far range as part of your action. When you move in a straight line into Melee range of a target from at least Close range and make an attack against that target in the same action, you can reroll all damage dice that rolled a result lower than your Proficiency.

Demolish.name: Demolish
Demolish.description:
Spend a Hope to move up to Far range in a straight line and make an attack against all targets within Melee range of the line. Targets you succeed against take d8+10 physical damage using your Proficiency and are temporarily Vulnerable.

@Template[type:ray|range:f]

5SXMT39vrZoK7GBM.name: Attack
5SXMT39vrZoK7GBM.description: Spend a Hope to move up to Far range in a straight line and make an attack against all targets within Melee range of the line. Targets you succeed against take d8+10 physical damage using your Proficiency and are temporarily Vulnerable.

Devastating Strikes.name: Devastating Strikes
Devastating Strikes.description: When you deal Severe damage to a target within Melee range, you can mark a Stress to force them to mark an additional Hit Point.

Il2C9zALU6a1gGrg.name: Mark Stress
Il2C9zALU6a1gGrg.description: When you deal Severe damage to a target within Melee range, you can mark a Stress to force them to mark an additional Hit Point.

Elusive Prey.name: Elusive Prey
Elusive Prey.description: When an attack roll against you would succeed, you can mark a Stress and roll a d4. Add the result to your Evasion against this attack.

9lvrqQKTEB3NRwvM.name: Mark Stress
9lvrqQKTEB3NRwvM.description: When an attack roll against you would succeed, you can mark a Stress and roll a d4. Add the result to your Evasion against this attack.

Fleet.name: Fleet
Fleet.description: Spend a Hope to move up to Far range without rolling.

pn5p2ocVvVPzDyAX.name: Move
pn5p2ocVvVPzDyAX.description: Spend a Hope to move up to Far range without rolling.

Fragile.name: Fragile
Fragile.description: When you take Major or greater damage, you drop out of Beastform.

Hobbling Strike.name: Hobbling Strike
Hobbling Strike.description: When you succeed on an attack against a target within Melee range, you can mark a Stress to make the target temporarily Vulnerable.

p8DESOMGA6dLwEMz.name: Mark Stress
p8DESOMGA6dLwEMz.description: When you succeed on an attack against a target within Melee range, you can mark a Stress to make the target temporarily Vulnerable.

Hollow Bones.name: Hollow Bones
Hollow Bones.description: You gain a −2 penalty to your damage thresholds.

RM8wHu5GIF6zfF7V.name: Hollow Bones
RM8wHu5GIF6zfF7V.description: You gain a −2 penalty to your damage thresholds.

Massive Stride.name: Massive Stride
Massive Stride.description: You can move up to Far range without rolling. You ignore rough terrain (at the GM’s discretion) due to your size.

Ocean Master.name: Ocean Master
Ocean Master.description: You can breathe and move naturally underwater. When you succeed on an attack against a target within Melee range, you can temporarily Restrain them.

ge2koBRj4snhIzDA.name: Restrain
ge2koBRj4snhIzDA.description: When you succeed on an attack against a target within Melee range, you can temporarily Restrain them.

Pack Hunting.name: Pack Hunting
Pack Hunting.description: When you succeed on an attack against the same target as an ally who acts immediately before you, add a d8 to your damage roll.

Physical Defense.name: Physical Defense
Physical Defense.description: You gain a +3 bonus to your damage thresholds.

hs9vWE92QQQx15ET.name: Physical Defense
hs9vWE92QQQx15ET.description: You gain a +3 bonus to your damage thresholds.

Rampage.name: Rampage
Rampage.description: When you roll a 1 on a damage die, you can roll a d10 and add the result to the damage roll. Additionally, before you make an attack roll, you can mark a Stress to gain a +1 bonus to your Proficiency for that attack.

N7IoOHpqcvcJNsJQ.name: Mark Stress
N7IoOHpqcvcJNsJQ.description: Before you make an attack roll, you can mark a Stress to gain a +1 bonus to your Proficiency for that attack.

A7l4JEBC1FFQajsN.name: Rampage
A7l4JEBC1FFQajsN.description: Before you make an attack roll, you can mark a Stress to gain a +1 bonus to your Proficiency for that attack.

Snapping Strike.name: Snapping Strike
Snapping Strike.description: When you succeed on an attack against a target within Melee range, you can spend a Hope to clamp that opponent in your jaws, making them temporarily Restrained and Vulnerable.

ib94yYJ1HA0dm0VC.name: Spend Hope
ib94yYJ1HA0dm0VC.description: When you succeed on an attack against a target within Melee range, you can spend a Hope to clamp that opponent in your jaws, making them temporarily Restrained and Vulnerable.

Takedown.name: Takedown
Takedown.description: Mark a Stress to move into Melee range of a target and make an attack roll against them. On a success, you gain a +2 bonus to your Proficiency for this attack and the target must mark a Stress.

DKorr1QzvtBz7d9y.name: Attack
DKorr1QzvtBz7d9y.description: Mark a Stress to move into Melee range of a target and make an attack roll against them. On a success, you gain a +2 bonus to your Proficiency for this attack and the target must mark a Stress.

hE6ciIusvKEtUQ8U.name: Takedown
hE6ciIusvKEtUQ8U.description: You gain a +2 bonus to your Proficiency for this attack and the target must mark a Stress.

Thick Hide.name: Thick Hide
Thick Hide.description: You gain a +2 bonus to your damage thresholds.

ZoUJy8EOm9mVXuAw.name: Thick Hide
ZoUJy8EOm9mVXuAw.description: You gain a +2 bonus to your damage thresholds.

Trample.name: Trample
Trample.description:
Mark a Stress to move up to Close range in a straight line and make an attack against all targets within Melee range of the line. Targets you succeed against take d8+1 physical damage using your Proficiency and are temporarily Vulnerable.

@Template[type:ray|range:close]

YCOTIv9IVEKpumbJ.name: Attack
YCOTIv9IVEKpumbJ.description: Mark a Stress to move up to Close range in a straight line and make an attack against all targets within Melee range of the line. Targets you succeed against take d8+1 physical damage using your Proficiency and are temporarily Vulnerable.

Undaunted.name: Undaunted
Undaunted.description: You gain a +2 bonus to all your damage thresholds.

wVoUVQJ2Ik7CiUuV.name: Undaunted
wVoUVQJ2Ik7CiUuV.description: You gain a +2 bonus to all your damage thresholds.

Unyielding.name: Unyielding
Unyielding.description: When you would mark an Armor Slot, roll a d6. On a result of 5 or higher, reduce the severity by one threshold without marking an Armor Slot.

hiGZCQpdTVqE5W4B.name: Roll d6
hiGZCQpdTVqE5W4B.description: When you would mark an Armor Slot, roll a d6. On a result of 5 or higher, reduce the severity by one threshold without marking an Armor Slot.

Venomous Bite.name: Venomous Bite
Venomous Bite.description: When you succeed on an attack against a target within Melee range, the target becomes temporarily Poisoned. A Poisoned creature takes 1d10 direct physical damage each time they act.

eow90DYK6cUWOk7g.name: Poison
eow90DYK6cUWOk7g.description: When you succeed on an attack against a target within Melee range, the target becomes temporarily Poisoned. A Poisoned creature takes 1d10 direct physical damage each time they act.

TTyAKKoUCoYXSMs4.name: Poisoned
TTyAKKoUCoYXSMs4.description: A Poisoned creature takes 1d10 direct physical damage each time they act.

Venomous Strike.name: Venomous Strike
Venomous Strike.description: Make an attack against any number of targets within Very Close range. On a success, a target is temporarily Poisoned. A Poisoned creature takes 1d10 physical direct damage each time they act.

igRoXxgaTT9tBQS7.name: Attack
igRoXxgaTT9tBQS7.description: Make an attack against any number of targets within Very Close range. On a success, a target is temporarily Poisoned. A Poisoned creature takes 1d10 physical direct damage each time they act.

1iQPj96LqUNkRaxE.name: Poisoned
1iQPj96LqUNkRaxE.description: A Poisoned creature takes 1d10 physical direct damage each time they act.

Vicious Maul.name: Vicious Maul
Vicious Maul.description: When you succeed on an attack against a target, you can spend a Hope to make them temporarily Vulnerable and gain a +1 bonus to your Proficiency for this attack.

Cc53vyYz5ggKdIbx.name: Spend Hope
Cc53vyYz5ggKdIbx.description: When you succeed on an attack against a target within Melee range, you can spend a Hope to clamp that opponent in your jaws, making them temporarily Restrained and Vulnerable.

Warning Hiss.name: Warning Hiss
Warning Hiss.description: Mark a Stress to force any number of targets within Melee range to move back to Very Close range.

D9YmUP1aeiCzNxcC.name: Mark Stress
D9YmUP1aeiCzNxcC.description: Mark a Stress to force any number of targets within Melee range to move back to Very Close range.

Webslinger.name: Webslinger
Webslinger.description: You can create a strong web material useful for both adventuring and battle. The web is resilient enough to support one creature. You can temporarily Restrain a target within Close range by succeeding on a Finesse Roll against them.

vRU6xutkp3VYxZ0i.name: Restrain
vRU6xutkp3VYxZ0i.description: You can temporarily Restrain a target within Close range by succeeding on a Finesse Roll against them.
